questions.text: What song did everyone sing at the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
"We Will Rock You".

	"We Will Rock You" is a song by the group Queen. It was written by lead guitarist Brian May. It is almost (if not always) paired with the song "We Are The Champions". The gang at Cheers started with one person doing the rhythm part of the song, then another, and another until they were all doing it, then they started to sing it.

questions.text: Who wrote a book in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Lilith.

	Frasier was very proud of his wife because she was now a published book author. Lilith said she was working on it for years, but was able to finish it during her 15 months of pregnancy.

questions.text: One of the characters wrote a book, what was it called?
questions.explanation:
"Good Girls, Bad Boys".

	Lilith's original title was "A Cross-Sectional Study of Control Group Females with a Tendency Towards Self-Destruction Vis-a-Vis Damaging Relationships with Members of the Opposite Sex." Woody replied, "Oh brother, not another one of those."

questions.text: What show was the author of the book going to be on?
questions.explanation:
"Tea Time with Brenda".

	Cliff new all about "Tea Time with Brenda" so Norm asked him if he watched the women's channel. Cliff tried to cover up by saying he passed by it while switching between the Combat channel and the Playboy channel.

questions.text: What was the possible side effect of the medication Cliff was taking?
questions.explanation:
gynocomastia.

	Gynocomastia is male breast enlargement. Cliff was so upset by this that he said he could cry. Woody replied, "That time of the month."

questions.text: How did the woman on the talk show describe Frasier?
questions.explanation:
a comfortable old shoe.

	Frasier was upset by this description. He didn't want to be a "good boy", he wanted to be like Sam, "a bad boy".

questions.text: To whom did Lilith say, "Let the buttons fly"?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	During "Tea Time for Brenda" Lilith was describing what a bad boy was like. Suddenly, she got turned on by Sam and made the statement "Let the buttons fly" and then kissed Sam.

questions.text: What book did Frasier say Lilith was at home writing?
options: "Bad Boys and How to Fix Them"
"How Even I, Dr. Lilith Sternin-Crane Could Fall for a Bad Boy"
questions.explanation:
"Pure Crap Volume 2".

	At first Frasier thought Lilith's book was very good. However, he said after analyzing it he decided it was pure crap. When asked where Lilith was he said "At home working on "Pure Crap Volume 2."

questions.text: How did Frasier prove he was a "bad boy"?
questions.explanation:
running with scissors.

	He ran around the room yelling "I am running with scissors." He then went on to say other bad things he was going to do such as petting stray dogs.

questions.text: Who did Frasier come back to the bar with?
questions.explanation:
Viper.

	Viper's real name was Ellen but Frasier liked to call her Viper. He also asked her to call him Slash. Viper was played by Lorelle Brina.
